name: Survive The Thunder
description:
Just a small game where you have to dodge the thunder.  Move around with WASD keys or you'll be striked by lightning. Each round gets harder. Made in 4 active days. 

INSTALLATION

Download and extract game archive, make sure res folder is right with the executable file.

Developers:

Alivebyte ( Game Logic, AI),

ugozapad ( Content Management System, Sound system, Sounds, Sprites, etc.).

Source Code: https://github.com/Alivebyte/SpaceShift

P.S. : Ignore SpaceShift in the name, the repo was created before theme was announced and we had a different game idea in mind.

Feel free to leave your opinion and suggestions in comments!
